# updateWindowsRunLoopOrdering

**Type Property**

Run-loop message priority for handling window updates.

## Declaration

```swift
class var updateWindowsRunLoopOrdering: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This constant is used by the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/RunLoop] method [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/RunLoop/perform(_:target:argument:order:modes:)].

## Managing Run Loops

- **displayWindowRunLoopOrdering**: The priority at which windows are displayed.
- **resetCursorRectsRunLoopOrdering**: The priority at which cursor rects are reset.
